findings.title: ERC20 Constructor Parameters Inverted
findings.description: The ERC20 constructor function is called with its parameter in inverted order: the token name and symbol are swapped.

findings.title: TokenUpgrader Address Hijack
findings.description: The token migration procedure involves the user transferring his tokens to the Upgrader contract. If a chain reorganization takes place between the moment the user obtains the contract address and the moment tokens are transferred, these tokens could end up being transferred to a TokenUpgrader contract with the same address but a different tokenHolder.

findings.title: User tokens lost during migrations because of blockchain reorganizations
findings.description: Tokens could be lost during a chain reorganization if inexperienced users fail to wait enough confirmations before sending their tokens to the new vault.
